concept.title: What is the addition of numbers
concept.shortdesc: In this section, you will learn about the concept of addition.

conbody.p: To successfully perform the task of adding the numbers, you must know what is addition. The term "Addition" represents a mathematical operation. Addition is a process, an action that you perform using numbers. Addition allows you to find the sum of the numbers.
You use the (+) sign to perform the operation in the app.
Addition is the arithematic operation to produce a sum of two or more numbers.
